author: Justin McCarthy
title: What South Korea can teach Ireland about Covid-19 fight
description: South Korea has been lauded internationally for managing to significantly slow the number of new cases of the virus, despite an early spike.
content:
Last week, Taoiseach Leo Varadkar said Ireland was following the South Korean model for tackling the coronavirus outbreak. 
That was, of course, before tighter restrictions were introduced on Friday night.
